title: Police hunt for Mirihana fire starters; Sketch of wanted suspect released
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Police Media Unit said that they are seeking public assistance to arrest the suspects who set fire to two buses in the Mirihana area on the 31st of March and caused damage to public property.
Accordingly, the CID is requesting the public to provide information to the following telephone numbers, for any information about a person who looks similar to the sketch released to the media.
Police hunt for Mirihana fire starters; Sketch of wanted suspect released
